name: Crayon Apron in Crosshatch
description:
The Crayon Apron is a great gift for the little artist in your life.  Twelve pockets can hold crayons, markers, paintbrushes, even chalk!  Includes a box of 24 crayons.  Perfect for new big siblings!  

Measures about 7" top to bottom, adjustable tie waistband fits up to a 30" waist.  100% cotton.

name: Tooth Fairy Pillow in Feathers
description:
Help the Tooth Fairy find that tiny tooth in the dark with a darling Tooth Fairy Pillow.  The hand-embroidered pocket is perfectly sized for a tooth (and then a little cash).  Measures about 4.5" square and has a ribbon hanging loop.  Backed in soft and fuzzy chenille.

100% cotton outer (exclusive of pocket), poly fill.

description:
Super-soft knit front and fuzzy cuddle back make for the softest, most cuddly blanket around.  Great for the stroller and thick enough to use as a playmat on hard floors.  Measures about 30" x 40" and is machine-washable.

100% cotton knit front, polyester cuddle back

name: Bella the Bird
description:
New for Fall + Winter 2013!

This plush toy illustrated by the amazing Erin Barker Illustration is sure to be your kiddo's new best buddy!  Long wings and legs are easy for kiddos to grab, and the bright colors and friendly face will catch their eye.

100% cotton stuffed with polyfill

name: Sprout Teether in Aqua Triangles
description:
This teether has two great textures for baby - a durable wooden ring, and organic cotton fabric.  The fabric leaves make the teether easy to grasp, and non-splintering maple feels great on gums.  

Pulls apart easily for washing - fabric is machine washable and dryer-friendly, hand wash wooden ring.

100% organic cotton fabric, maple ring sealed with organic beeswax and olive oil

20201 ATR

name: Pacifier Clip in Crosshatch
description:
Keep that pacifier off the floor with these cute and useful Pacifier Clips.  Features a safety-tested plastic clip to attach to bib or shirt and an elastic loop that works with almost every pacifier.  Measures about 7.5", not including elastic.

100% cotton, CPSIA-compliant plastic clip.
